description: This is a Flutter widget implementing an admin dashboard page with summary data fetched from an API. It displays key performance indicators (KPIs) like total courts, bookings today, and active users, along with admin tools information.

classes.name: AdminDashboardPage
classes.description: Main widget for the admin dashboard page, displaying summary KPIs with refresh capability.

classes.name: _AdminDashboardPageState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching, error handling, and UI for AdminDashboardPage.

classes.name: _KpiCard
classes.description: Stateless widget for displaying a single KPI card with a label, value, icon, and color.

methods.name: _loadSummary
methods.description: Fetches the admin summary data from the API and updates the state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard page, displaying loading indicator, error message, or KPI data.
